name: Commodore Amiga GORF
description:
The Galactic Orbital Robot Force has struck alliances with other aliens to invade Earth! Can you beat all of their forces and rise up the 6 ranks?

GORF was a retro arcade shoot 'em up game released by Midway in 1981. This is a Windows remake of the game which is based on both the arcade and Amiga versions.

This remake was originally made some time in the 2000s/2010s using Game Maker. Gameplay video by a friend.
